bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of a feeling of uncomfortable fullness and distension. Su wen 素問 74: 胸膈不利， 心痛痞滿 , “The chest and diaphragm are not freely passable. [Patients suffer from] heartache with obstacle-illness and a feeling of fullness”.

② Pathological Condition of an uncomfortable distension and fullness in the chest and abdominal region. When pressed there is no pain. Su wen 素問 70: 其色黃，其養肉，其病 痞，其 味甘 , “Its color is yellow. It nourishes the flesh. Its disease is an obstacle-illness . Its flavor is sweet”.
